### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://cute-cursor.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcute-cursor.com%2F) ### Comment Username: @moonftn > Websites often appear in new tabs. in 2 minutes he often appears one by one to many. issue.title: www.youtube.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://www.youtube.com/@tunetankmusic/about](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F%40tunetankmusic%2Fabout) ### Comment > I used AdGuard on Chromium, Brave, and Firefox. While AdGuard is active I can not unsubscribe from any video on YouTube on any browser. Disabling and trying the page again fails. If I disable AdGuard, close the browsers, then restart, the unsubscribe button is visible again. I did update filters. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YuvCGojKkpQ](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DYuvCGojKkpQ) ### Comment Username: @JohnMarkAnthony > The problem is that when ADGUARD is activated or deactivated, it blocks the Shazam extension software. Subsequently, the popup bundles that notify if the music is found are blocked by ADGUARD without further ado, and I would appreciate it if my ticket is answered as soon as possible. > > el problema radica que el ADGUARD al estar activado o desactivado bloqueo el sotfware de la extesion de shazam posteriormente las notificaciones o paquetes emergentes que notifican si la musica es encontrada son bloqueados por el ADGUARD sin mas gracias y agradeceria si mi ticket es respondido lo antes posible ### Screenshots

issue.body:

issue.title: www.reddit.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.reddit.com/r/Adguard/comments/16n92px/anyone_get_a_dns_profile_to_work_on_tvos_17/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.reddit.com%2Fr%2FAdguard%2Fcomments%2F16n92px%2Fanyone_get_a_dns_profile_to_work_on_tvos_17%2F) ### Comment > Many many pages stopped being loaded correctly since iOS 17 update. Even this same page where I am writing didn’t load with filtering active!!!! ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/oy9ggoxaj00o8kocs0440o80oo8ocw8lwirrccsf4g.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/nndzg056d8g0ckg4sgcc4wwkoosco0hdxh9bqlm48w.jpg?nc=1)
